actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to reinstate the authority of the Public Health Service to regulate trains, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to declare that the authority of the Surgeon General under current law to make and enforce regulations to prevent the spread of communicable diseases exists notwithstanding any other provision of Federal law.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to reinstate the authority of the Public Health Service to regulate trains, and for other purposes.
